CustomField.description: Administrators populate this optional text field with the screen that displays when users add or edit an asset on a lease. By default, the value is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this optional field to define the screen that displays when users add or edit an asset on a lease. If a screen is not defined, the LLC_BI_Screen_c screen will be used by default.
CustomField.label: Leasing Screen
